title: (x) The Shawshank Redemption - Wade Sans {Romesh}
content:
Anyone know what font they used for the original VHS/DVD release of the Shawshank Redemption?   
   
The sample I've attached is a bit furry, but hopefully it's enough to give a stear.   
   
Any help would be much appreciated, cheers!   
Terry ![Shawshank Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227204311im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40157.jpg)
author: tscruby

comments.content:
looks like a modified wade sans.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/wade-sans-light/light/testdrive.html?s=SHAWSHANK+REDEMPTION&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227204311/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/wade-sans-light/light/testdrive.html?s=SHAWSHANK%2BREDEMPTION&p=48)

Looks close enough for me!   
Cheers for that,

Looks close enough for me!   
Cheers for that,
